c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowScore
c:functionType.c:documentation: The function type for scoring individual data according to some criteria

c:returns.c:documentation: The score of the element. If an element is to be removed it should return null. Otherwise it should return some numeric or date value.

c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowSelect
c:functionType.c:documentation: The function to select which data to remove given a set

c:argument.name: allData
c:argument.c:documentation: The set of data to evaluate.

c:argument.name: remove
c:argument.c:documentation: An array to store the data to remove
